entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
